step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your arms straight overhead and fingers spread wide.
You're doing well with the arm stretch overhead. Remember to exhale as you relax and return your arms.
Great job making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together. Inhale deeply as you tighten your muscles.
Excellent work stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Keep up the good form.
You've completed the repetitions! Remember to repeat the full sequence 4 times for best results.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Focus on keeping your arms straight overhead with fingers spread, then making a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to inhale as you tighten and exhale as you relax.
